mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(PYNM_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS yyyymmdd, SUM(PYNM_TOTAL_AMT) AS paymentTotal, MAX(PYNM_DT) AS pynm_dt, MAX(FRCS_NO) AS frcs_no, MAX(PYNM_NO) AS pynm_no FROM payment WHERE PYNM_DT BETWEEN TO_DATE('2023-01-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE('2024-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND FRCS_NO = #{frcsNo} GROUP BY TO_CHAR(PYNM_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER BY yyyymmdd DESC

select pd.MENU_NM as MENU_NM, sum(pd.PYNM_CNT) as PYNM_CNT, sum(pd.MENU_PRICE) as MENU_PRICE, Max(p.PYNM_DT) as PYNM_DT
from payment_detail pd, payment p
where pd.pynm_no = p.pynm_no
and TO_CHAR(p.PYNM_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(#{pynmDt}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and p.FRCS_NO = #{frcsNo} group by pd.MENU_NM

SELECT p.PYNM_NO, p.MEM_NO, m.MEM_NM, m.MEM_TEL, p.FRCS_NO, p.PYNM_MTHD_ID, p.PYNM_DT, p.PYNM_TOTAL_AMT, p.SETUP_MENU_YN
FROM payment p, member m WHERE p.mem_no = m.mem_no and TO_DATE(pynm_dt, 'YY/MM/DD') = TO_DATE (TO_CHAR(#{pynmDt},'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') order by pynm_no desc
select menu_nm, pynm_cnt, menu_price from payment_detail where PYNM_NO = #{pynmNo}
